GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object with the given id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the votes property of an article object with the given id

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all the comments associated with the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment onto the chosen article

exampleBody.body: I'm not sure I agree with the author on this topic

exampleResponse.author: t_andrews
exampleResponse.body: I'm not sure I agree with the author on this topic

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments the votes property of a comment with the given id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with the given ID. Returns 204 with no response body

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: Serves the full list of usernames in the database

GET /api/users/:username.description: Servers the infomation about the user with the requested username

parameter.username: Existing username in database. Returns http status 404 otherwise
